LanguageData.VCE_CanMeats.label: can meats x20
LanguageData.VCE_CanMeats.description: Safely store meat chunks in a steel can. Canning food extends its shelf life almost indefinitely.
LanguageData.VCE_CanProduce.label: can produce x20
LanguageData.VCE_CanProduce.description: Safely store vegetables in a steel can. Canning food extends its shelf life almost indefinitely.
LanguageData.VCE_CanFruit.label: can fruit x20
LanguageData.VCE_CanFruit.description: Safely store fruit in a steel can. Canning food extends its shelf life almost indefinitely.\n\nPreserved fruit can be used in the production of desserts.
LanguageData.VCE_CanEggs.label: can eggs x20
LanguageData.VCE_CanEggs.description: Safely store boiled eggs in a steel can. Canning food extends its shelf life almost indefinitely.
